mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO ASS_BILL_MAIN (
group_id ,
hos_id ,
copy_code ,
bill_no ,
invoice_no ,
bill_date ,
ven_id ,
ven_no ,
pact_code ,
state ,
create_emp ,
create_date ,
note ,
store_id ,
store_no ,
) VALUES (
#{group_id} ,
#{hos_id} ,
#{copy_code} ,
#{bill_no} ,
#{invoice_no} ,
to_date(#{bill_date},'YYYY-MM-DD') ,
#{ven_id} ,
#{ven_no} ,
#{pact_code} ,
#{state} ,
#{create_emp} ,
to_date(#{create_date},'YYYY-MM-DD') ,
#{note} ,
#{store_id} ,
#{store_no} ,
)
mapper.select:
select distinct t.ass_card_no, t2.ass_name, t.pay_plan_money, t.stage_no, t.stage_name, c.pay_term_name, t.pay_plan_date, t.pay_money, t.unpay_money, b.sup_name ven_name, t4.invoice_no, t.ass_naturs naturs_code, t1.ass_in_no, t1.in_date
from v_ass_pay_stage t
left join mat_pay_term c on t.group_id = c.group_id and t.hos_id = c.hos_id and t.copy_code = c.copy_code and t.pay_term_id = c.pay_term_id and c.is_stop = 0
left join hos_sup_dict b on t.group_id = b.group_id and t.hos_id = b.hos_id and t.ven_id = b.sup_id and b.is_stop = 0
left join v_ass_card t1 on t.group_id = t1.group_id and t.hos_id = t1.hos_id and t.copy_code = t1.copy_code and t.ass_card_no = t1.ass_card_no and t.ass_naturs = t1.ass_naturs
left join ass_no_dict t2 on t1.group_id = t2.group_id and t1.hos_id = t2.hos_id and t1.copy_code = t2.copy_code and t1.ass_id = t2.ass_id and t2.is_stop = 0
left join v_ass_in_main t4 on t1.group_id = t4.group_id and t1.hos_id = t4.hos_id and t1.copy_code = t4.copy_code and t1.ass_in_no = t4.ass_in_no and t1.ass_naturs = t4.ass_naturs
left join v_ass_bill_vis vabv on t.group_id = vabv.group_id and t.hos_id = vabv.hos_id and t.copy_code = vabv.copy_code and t.ass_card_no = vabv.ass_card_no
where t.group_id = #{group_id} and t.hos_id = #{hos_id} and t.copy_code = #{copy_code} and t.ven_id = #{ven_id} and t1.store_id = #{store_id}
and exists ( select 1 from v_ass_change_detail tt
left join v_ass_change_main t5 on tt.group_id = t5.group_id and tt.hos_id = t5.hos_id and tt.copy_code = t5.copy_code and tt.change_no = t5.change_no where t.ASS_CARD_NO = tt.ASS_CARD_NO and t.pay_plan_money = tt.CHANGE_PRICE
and tt.change_no = #{change_no}
AND t5.change_date >= to_date(#{change_date_beg},'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND t5.change_date <= to_date(#{change_date_end},'YYYY-MM-DD')
)
and t.ass_card_no = #{ass_card_no}
and t1.ass_in_no = #{ass_in_no}
and t4.invoice_no like '%${invoice_no}%'
AND t1.in_date >= to_date(#{in_date_beg},'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND t1.in_date <= to_date(#{in_date_end},'YYYY-MM-DD')
and t1.use_state not in (6,7)
and t.unpay_money > 0 and t.unbill_money > 0 and t.pay_plan_money != nvl(vabv.bill_money,0) and t1.use_state != 0 order by t.ass_card_no,t.stage_no desc

SELECT a.group_id, a.hos_id, a.copy_code, a.bill_no, a.invoice_no, a.bill_date, a.ven_id, a.ven_no, b.sup_code ven_code, b.sup_name ven_name, a.pact_code, a.bill_money, a.state, case when a.state = 0 then '新建' when a.state = 1 then '审核' when a.state = 2 then '确认' else '' end state_name, a.create_emp, su1.user_name create_emp_name, a.create_date, a.audit_emp, su2.user_name audit_emp_name, a.audit_date, a.note, a.store_id, a.store_no, hsd.store_code, hsd.store_name FROM ASS_BILL_MAIN a left join hos_sup_dict b on a.group_id = b.group_id and a.hos_id = b.hos_id and a.ven_id = b.sup_id and b.is_stop = 0
left join hos_store_dict hsd on a.group_id = hsd.group_id and a.hos_id = hsd.hos_id and a.store_id = hsd.store_id and hsd.is_stop = 0
left join sys_user su1 on a.group_id = su1.group_id and a.hos_id = su1.hos_id and a.create_emp = su1.user_id
left join sys_user su2 on a.group_id = su2.group_id and a.hos_id = su2.hos_id and a.audit_emp = su2.user_id WHERE a.group_id = #{group_id} and a.hos_id = #{hos_id} and a.copy_code = #{copy_code} and a.bill_no = #{bill_no}

select a.bill_no as id,a.hos_id,a.copy_code,a.group_id,a.note,a.bill_no, case when a.state = 0 then '新建' when a.state = 1 then '审核' when a.state = 2 then '确定' else '' end state , s.user_name AUDIT_EMP, s.user_name CREATE_EMP, to_char(a.CREATE_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') CREATE_DATE, to_char(a.AUDIT_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AUDIT_DATE, to_char(a.BILL_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') BILL_DATE, to_char(a.BILL_MONEY,'FM999,999,990.00') bill_money,a.INVOICE_NO, a.ven_id, a.ven_no, c.sup_code ven_code, c.sup_name ven_name, a.store_id, a.store_no, hsd.store_code, hsd.store_name from ASS_BILL_MAIN a
left join ASS_BILL_MAIN b on b.group_id=a.group_id and b.hos_id=a.hos_id and b.COPY_CODE =a.COPY_CODE and b.BILL_NO = a.BILL_NO left join sys_user s on s.group_id=a.group_id and s.hos_id=a.hos_id and s.user_id=a.CREATE_EMP and s.IS_STOP = 0 left join sys_user s1 on s1.group_id=a.group_id and s1.hos_id=a.hos_id and s1.user_id=a.AUDIT_EMP and s1.IS_STOP = 0
left join hos_sup_dict c on a.group_id = c.group_id and a.hos_id = c.hos_id and a.ven_id = c.sup_id and c.is_stop = 0
left join hos_store_dict hsd on a.group_id = hsd.group_id and a.hos_id = hsd.hos_id and a.store_id = hsd.store_id and hsd.is_stop = 0
where a.group_id = #{group_id} AND a.hos_id = #{hos_id} AND a.copy_code = #{copy_code} AND a.bill_no in (${paraId})

select a.bill_no as id,a.hos_id,a.copy_code,a.group_id,a.note,a.bill_no, case when a.state = 0 then '新建' when a.state = 1 then '审核' when a.state = 2 then '确定' else '' end state , s.user_name AUDIT_EMP, s.user_name CREATE_EMP, to_char(a.CREATE_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') CREATE_DATE, to_char(a.AUDIT_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AUDIT_DATE, to_char(a.BILL_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') BILL_DATE, to_char(a.BILL_MONEY,'FM999,999,990.00') bill_money,a.INVOICE_NO, a.ven_id, a.ven_no, c.sup_code ven_code, c.sup_name ven_name, a.store_id, a.store_no, hsd.store_code, hsd.store_name from ASS_BILL_MAIN a
left join ASS_BILL_MAIN b on b.group_id=a.group_id and b.hos_id=a.hos_id and b.COPY_CODE =a.COPY_CODE and b.BILL_NO = a.BILL_NO left join sys_user s on s.group_id=a.group_id and s.hos_id=a.hos_id and s.user_id=a.CREATE_EMP and s.IS_STOP = 0 left join sys_user s1 on s1.group_id=a.group_id and s1.hos_id=a.hos_id and s1.user_id=a.AUDIT_EMP and s1.IS_STOP = 0
left join hos_sup_dict c on a.group_id = c.group_id and a.hos_id = c.hos_id and a.ven_id = c.sup_id and c.is_stop = 0
left join hos_store_dict hsd on a.group_id = hsd.group_id and a.hos_id = hsd.hos_id and a.store_id = hsd.store_id and hsd.is_stop = 0
where a.group_id = #{group_id} AND a.hos_id = #{hos_id} AND a.copy_code = #{copy_code} AND a.bill_no = #{bill_no}

select a.ASS_CARD_NO, a.ASS_IN_NO, a.ASS_SPEC, a.ASS_MONDL, a.ASS_BRAND, a.ASS_AMOUNT, b.ass_name, c.fac_name, a.ASS_AMOUNT, a.PRICE, d.state_name, a.USE_STATE, e.invoice_no, a.VEN_ID, a.VEN_NO from v_ass_card a left join ass_no_dict b on a.group_id = b.group_id and a.hos_id = b.hos_id and a.copy_code = b.copy_code and a.ass_id = b.ass_id and b.is_stop = 0 left join hos_fac_dict c on a.group_id = c.group_id and a.hos_id = c.hos_id and a.fac_id = c.fac_id and c.is_stop = 0 left join ass_card_use_state d on a.use_state = d.state_code and d.is_stop = 0 left join v_ass_in_main e on e.group_id = a.GROUP_ID and e.hos_id = a.HOS_ID and e.copy_code = a.COPY_CODE and e.ass_in_no =a.ASS_IN_NO and e.ass_naturs = a.ass_naturs where a.group_id = #{GROUP_ID,jdbcType=INTEGER} and a.hos_id = #{HOS_ID,jdbcType=INTEGER} and a.copy_code = #{COPY_CODE,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and a.ass_in_no = #{ass_in_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and a.ven_id = #{ven_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select t.ass_card_no, t2.ass_name, t.pay_plan_money, t.stage_no, t.stage_name, c.pay_term_name, t.pay_plan_date, t.pay_money, t.unpay_money, b.sup_name ven_name, t4.invoice_no, t.ass_naturs naturs_code, t1.ass_in_no
from v_ass_pay_stage t
left join mat_pay_term c on t.group_id = c.group_id and t.hos_id = c.hos_id and t.copy_code = c.copy_code and t.pay_term_id = c.pay_term_id and c.is_stop = 0
left join hos_sup_dict b on t.group_id = b.group_id and t.hos_id = b.hos_id and t.ven_id = b.sup_id and b.is_stop = 0
left join v_ass_card t1 on t.group_id = t1.group_id and t.hos_id = t1.hos_id and t.copy_code = t1.copy_code and t.ass_card_no = t1.ass_card_no and t.ass_naturs = t1.ass_naturs
left join ass_no_dict t2 on t1.group_id = t2.group_id and t1.hos_id = t2.hos_id and t1.copy_code = t2.copy_code and t1.ass_id = t2.ass_id and t2.is_stop = 0
left join v_ass_in_main t4 on t1.group_id = t4.group_id and t1.hos_id = t4.hos_id and t1.copy_code = t4.copy_code and t1.ass_in_no = t4.ass_in_no and t1.ass_naturs = t4.ass_naturs
left join v_ass_change_detail t3 on t.group_id = t3.group_id and t.hos_id = t3.hos_id and t.copy_code = t3.copy_code and t.ass_card_no = t3.ass_card_no and t.ass_naturs = t3.ass_naturs
left join v_ass_change_main t5 on t3.group_id = t5.group_id and t3.hos_id = t5.hos_id and t3.copy_code = t5.copy_code and t3.change_no = t5.change_no and t3.ass_naturs = t5.ass_naturs
left join v_ass_bill_vis vabv on t.group_id = vabv.group_id and t.hos_id = vabv.hos_id and t.copy_code = vabv.copy_code and t.ass_card_no = vabv.ass_card_no
where t.group_id = #{group_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and t.hos_id = #{hos_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and t.copy_code = #{copy_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and nvl(t1.dispose_type,0) != 41
and t.ass_card_no = #{ass_card_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and t.unpay_money > 0 and t.unbill_money > 0 and t.pay_plan_money > nvl(vabv.bill_money,0) and t1.use_state != 0 order by t.ass_card_no desc
